title: Brian Cox (physicist)
summary: Brian Edward Cox CBE FRS (born 3 March 1968) is an English physicist and former musician who is a professor of particle physics in the School of Physics and Astronomy at the University of Manchester.[2][3] He is best known to the public as the presenter of science programmes, especially the Wonders of... series[4][5] and for popular science books, such as Why Does E=mcÂ²? and The Quantum Universe.
